page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content: The following numbers were recorded: {HOUSES:} Detached -{79 Semi " -{50 { BUNGALOWS}Detached -{81} Semi " -{43} {TERRACED }Cottages/-{59} Houses {FARMS: } -{24} { OTHERS:}including -{20} church,shops, abbatoir,school and Institute. The oldest buildings are in Main St. Roos,Tunstall,and many outlying farms and cottages.The newest houses are in South End,Roos,an area which is still being developed,although there is considerable opposition to any further development.The Eastfield Estate is an old people's estate having 35 dwellings and a resident warden.
